config_part.ioc_desc: Oxford Instruments ILM 200 series Level Meter
config_part.ioc_details: Oxford instruments Intelligent Level Meter 200 series

macro.name: USE_ISOBUS
macro.description: Whether to use ISOBUS for communications (default: Yes)

macro.name: CH1_ALARM_THRESHOLD
macro.description: Alarm threshold for level on channel 1 (default: 0%)

macro.name: CH2_ALARM_THRESHOLD
macro.description: Alarm threshold for level on channel 2 (default: 0%)

macro.name: CH3_ALARM_THRESHOLD
macro.description: Alarm threshold for level on channel 3 (default: 0%)
